title: Packaging Options Direct 3 Gallon Glass Italian Carboy with 30 mm Cork Neck Finish
description: The new Daily Roman Missal (according to the Roman Missal, Third Edition with the new English translation) includes prayers and readings to all Sunday and daily Masses in one volume. It is a complete source for following the Mass, and reflecting on its profound beauty and grace. Available in hardbound-the Daily Roman Missal is an ideal size to carry, at just 4.75" x 6.75," it easily fits in a briefcase, backpack, or carry-on when traveling.Anytime, Anywhere ...Reflect and pray on the beauty and meaning of the Mass. This missal helps you prepare, participate in and live the daily celebration of the Eucharist.
